articles.title: Sovereign Tower Preview: Hands-On With This Unique Arthurian Round Table Management RPG
articles.title_tr: Sovereign Tower Preview: Hands-On With This Unique Arthurian Round Table Management RPG
articles.summary: Sovereign Tower has an entertaining concept that draws its characters and dialogue equally from fantastical tradition and modern life. Couple that with a deliciously detailed art style and a sense of what's most entertaining to do in both management games and visual novels and that's enough to sell it, we think, but it also has some nice surprises and a weird little twist on the genre as a whole. We had a pretty darn good time with it, and I'm looking forward to more.
articles.summary_tr: Sovereign Tower has an entertaining concept that draws its characters and dialogue equally from fantastical tradition and modern life. Couple that with a deliciously detailed art style and a sense of what's most entertaining to do in both management games and visual novels and that's enough to sell it, we think, but it also has some nice surprises and a weird little twist on the genre as a whole. We had a pretty darn good time with it, and I'm looking forward to more.

articles.title: İstanbul'da et fiyatları Ramazan sonuna kadar sabitlendi: İşte marketler ve fiyatlar
articles.title_tr: İstanbul'da et fiyatları Ramazan sonuna kadar sabitlendi: İşte marketler ve fiyatlar
articles.summary: İstanbul PERDER, Et ve Süt Kurumu ile yapılan protokol kapsamında kırmızı et ve tereyağı fiyatlarının 22 Ocak'tan itibaren Ramazan ayı sonuna kadar sabitlendiğini açıkladı. Buna göre üye marketlerde dana kıyma 485 lira, dana kuşbaşı 510 lira ve tereyağı 384 liradan satışa sunulacak.
